typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'xml',
	fileSystem: 'staging',
	folderPath: 'spotlight/checklists',
	fileName: 'checklists.xml',
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true) ~> checklists
checklists parse(format: 'xml',
	namespaces: true) ~> Parse1
Parse1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['HSEaudit.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
